value:
$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Stop wriggling, you worms! It's time
to let Helbindi put you to sleep.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Pain|What is it with you filth? Rrgh... You
won't give in? Well, me either!$k$p

$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Pain|I...can't pull it off. But I have to. I
have no choice...$k$pIf I don't... He'll...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Helbindi.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|What do you want?$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|You may put down your axe. Your
duty is at an end.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|What? I've still got rats to kill.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|That falls to us now. As royalty of
Múspell, this is our responsibility. You
may leave the battlefield.$k$pDo not worry. I won't let Father know
that you live.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face|This is the opposite of what you told
me before! Explain yourself!$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$pWe have spoken with Father. After
your loss at the Fortress of Cinders...
Helbindi...$k$pTo make an example of you...Father
burned the slums. He killed everyone.$k$pAnd your sister...I am told she died
there.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|This is difficult to say...but our orders
can no longer compel you. You have
no reason to fight.$k$pPlease, just...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face|Helbindi...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Pain|That's how it is, is it? I see. I get it.$k$p$WmMPID_レーギャルン,ch00_11_Laegjarn_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_ヘルビンディ,ch00_12_Helbindi_M_Normal,Face_Pain|That's how it is. So I... Now I...$k$p$Sbs150|
